      • exportObject

        @GET
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response exportObject(@PathParam(value="path")
                                         String externalPath,
                                         @QueryParam(value="format")@DefaultValue(value="jcr/xml")
                                         String format,
                                         @QueryParam(value="skipBinary")@DefaultValue(value="true")
                                         String skipBinary,
                                         @QueryParam(value="recurse")@DefaultValue(value="false")
                                         String recurse)
        Export an object with the given format, e.g.: GET /path/to/object/fcr:export?format=jcr/xml : the node as JCR/XML
        Parameters:
        externalPath - the external path
        format - the format string
        skipBinary - the value whether skip binary
        recurse - the value whether recurse
        Returns:
        object in the given format
